snippet: Britain’s central bank kept its benchmark rate at 0.5 percent as officials try to balance a robust economic recovery with a frothy housing market.
abstract: Bank of England leaves its key interest rate unchanged at record low 0.5 percent as policy makers seek to balance Britain’s robust economic recovery with overheating housing market.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s central bank kept its benchmark rate at 0.5 percent as officials try to balance a robust economic recovery with a frothy housing market.

headline.main: Bank of England Leaves Key Interest Rate Unchanged
headline.print_headline: Bank of England Votes to Keep Interest Rates at Record Low
